titles.title: To give the force and effect of law to the Executive Order issued on March 6, 2025 entitled "Establishment of the Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and United States Digital Asset Stockpile".
To give the force and effect of law to the Executive Order issued on March 6, 2025 entitled "Establishment of the Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and United States Digital Asset Stockpile".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
